General.Name: Mediatechnics Corp
General.Description: MediaTechnics Corporation operates as a developer of advertising Websites and applications for marijuana industry. It develops BlazeNow, a suite of mobile applications for the iOS and Android operating systems; and BlazeNow.com, a Website to provide product and location advertising services, as well as a mutually consumer review system for dispensaries, doctors, and delivery services in the legal Cannabis industry. The company also offers professional consulting services to legal recreational and medical cannabis markets; and products packaging and private labeling services. In addition, it engages in researching and testing nutrients to promote flower yields and eliminating crop-damaging pests; and indoor cultivation technologies, including LED lights and environmental control devices, as well as mining, analyzing, and supplying sales and product data information. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: Building D, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89119
